title.full: Time Flows But Does Not Return
title.reduced: Time Flows But Does Not Return

developer: The Shape of Games to Come
publisher: The Shape of Games to Come

description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. We can do many things with the time available to us, but how do we decide what activities to engage in?  How do we determine what has meaning to us?  Time Flows, But Does Not Return is an attempt to communicate the feelings behind that process using gameplay, rather than words or narrative.
description.short: We can do many things with the time available to us, but how do we decide what activities to engage in?  How do we determine what has meaning to us?
